I'm imagining an Illaoi Doom Bot, and I'm cringing.

BRING BACK DBOD!

I really enjoyed DBoD because they offered unique challenges. The bots were ridiculously OP, and we knew that, but we still tried to defeat them. And when we did, it was just so satisfying.

Although, I do agree with ChaosThief. It would be very laborious to update all of the bots, etc. However, I honestly think that DBoD was one of the best Featured Game Modes because it encouraged cooperation and teamwork. It was a kind of boss-level-style of game mode that we don't see much of in League. Dragon and Baron don't really count–only Xerath in Ascension, and even then, he isn't THAT hard to kill.
I for one, really appreciate the rotating game mode addition! Thanks!

Riot said AT LEAST twice this year, at this rate, probably a lot more.

As the guy who stated over and over again his disappointment with URF not showing up on April 1st due to genuine life-important things related to it. Upset that it would barely be around this year for genuine reasons.

You're sad for no reason. They've since stated that gamemodes would be expected to return "1.5~2 months" the fact that URF came back after only 4 weeks is incredible. It's a very positive and hope-giving state.

Think of it this way, if it came back every 4 weeks, that'd be more URF in a year than BOTH of the previous years combined (2.5 x 13 = 32.5. Previous years were about 13~14 days each). Even if it came back every 2 months that'd be 6x2.5 (15) days. And that's if they decide not to give more than just the weekend. Which they really ought to do given the number of people who can't play on weekends.

All in the all, the future looks bright.
